item.title: SDForAll
item.description: /c/SDForAll on normalcity.life https://normalcity.life/c/sdforall Description A community about Stable Diffusion. This is the Lemmy counterpart to [r/sdforall](https://www.reddit.com/r/sdforall/). ### Rules: In addition to NCL's [instance-wide rules](https://normalcity.life/post/972), the below rules apply when posting to and interacting with SDForAll. **1. SD Related** Posts must be related to Stable Diffusion. **2. Be Respectful** No hateful posts or comments targeting a person or group. Behind every keyboard is usually a living human being. If you are having a bad day, [!
